admin/cms/clerkio.recs.title: Clerk.io Recommendations
admin/cms/clerkio.recs.block.class.name: Block Class Name
admin/cms/clerkio.recs.block.class.descr: Unique class Name - Please avoid using the same class for different Clerk Blocks. Don't use 'clerk' as class name
admin/cms/clerkio.recs.block.template.de: Template name from Clerk content, starting with @
admin/cms/clerkio.recs.block.logic.name: Product Logic
admin/cms/clerkio.search.title: Clerk.io Search Page
admin/cms/clerkio.search.description: Block creates search landing page using Clerk API
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.class.des: Unique class Name - Please avoid using the same class for different Clerk Blocks. Don't use 'clerk' as class name
Template name from Clerk content, starting with @
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetsatt: A comma separated list of the attribute slugs you wish to use for filtering
Provide a list of attributes used in facets, followed by a colon with their given title. Eg. price:Price,categories:Collection
Provide a list of attributes used in facets as multi-selectable, separated by commas.
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetsfil: The text you want displayed on the toggle filters button
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetsvie: The text displayed on the view more button in the facets
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetssea: The placeholder text for the filters within the facets
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetsdes: The numeric ID of the facets design you wish to use
admin/cms/clerkio.search.block.facetspri: The symbol you want after the price ranges in the facets
The symbol you want before the price ranges in the facets
admin/cms/clerkio.searchinput.title: Clerk.io Search Input Field
admin/cms/clerkio.searchinput.block.plac: Placeholder text for search input field
admin/cms/clerkio.livesearch.title: Clerk.io Live Search
admin/cms/clerkio.livesearch.description: Predictive type ahead search by Clerk.io
admin/cms/clerkio.livesearch.block.class: Unique class Name - Please avoid using the same class for different Clerk Blocks. Don't use 'clerk' as class name
admin/cms/clerkio.livesearch.block.templ: Template name from Clerk content, starting with @
admin/cms/clerkio.livesearch.block.insta: CSS selector for the search input field
Number of suggestions to include. Eg. 3
Number of categories to include. Eg. 3
Number of pages to include. Eg. 3
Position of the instant search. Eg. left, below, center, right, off
